thread.title: Xiaomi Mi 6 to reportedly come in flat and curved screen variants, pricing also tipped
thread.title_full: Xiaomi Mi 6 to reportedly come in flat and curved screen variants, pricing also tipped

title: Xiaomi Mi 6 to reportedly come in flat and curved screen variants, pricing also tipped
text:
Xiaomi Mi 6 to reportedly come in flat and curved screen variants,... Xiaomi Mi 6 to reportedly come in flat and curved screen variants, pricing also tipped By - January 10, 2017 “The Mi 6 will allegedly feature a Snapdragon 835 SoC, up to 6GB of RAM, and a 4,000mAh battery” 
Xiaomi’s upcoming flagship, allegedly dubbed the Mi 6, has been the subject of several reports and leaks in the past couple of weeks. The phone is expected to be one of the first devices to be powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 processor. Now a new report has revealed that the Mi 6 will come in a couple of variants. The report has also tipped core specifications and pricing of the device. 
As per the source, the Xiaomi Mi 6 will be available in two models – one with a flat screen and another one with a curved display. Both will be powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 processors. The flat screen variant of the Mi 6 will get 4GB of RAM, while the model with a curved display will be fitted with 6GB of RAM. The former will be priced at RMB 1,999 (around Rs 19,700), while the latter will be available for Rs 24,600. 
An earlier report had suggested that the Xiaomi Mi 6’s trial production will begin this month. It will feature a fingerprint sensor, but it will not be a Qualcomm Ultrasonic one. The phone will feature a 4,000mAh battery with Quick Charge 4.0 fast charging. It is said to utilise the latest LPDDR4X memory chip with UFS2.1 standard. The company is expected to unveil the phone on Valentine’s Day.
